scripts.prepublish: cd nativescript-tsx && npm install && cd .. && cd app-tsx-example && npm install && cd .. && npm run link && npm run build
scripts.link: cd nativescript-tsx && npm link && cd ../app-tsx-example && npm link nativescript-tsx && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run tsc-nativescript-tsx && npm run tsc-app-tsx-example
